name: Almora Kausani Tour
packageInclude: All Drink Included,Insurance.Tour Guide,Lunch In Restaurant,All Ticket Museum

overview.Day 1: NAINITAL: We will arrange for a pick up from Delhi Railway Station or Airport. Proceed for a drive to Nainital. On arrival in Nainital, check in at the hotel. In evening you are free to explore famous Mall Road and shopping market in Nainital. You can also go for boat ride at Naini Lake (at your own cost). Dinner and overnight stay will be at the hotel.
overview.Day 2: NAINITAL: Breakfast at the hotel, proceed for a lake tour of Bhimtal, Sattal and Naukuchiatal. These three lakes are must visit attractions for every tourist. Return back to the hotel. Dinner and overnight stay will be at the hotel.
overview.Day 3: ALMORA: Breakfast at the hotel, proceed for a trip to Almora. Later on, visit Deer Park, Kasar Devi, Mohan Joshi Park, Chitai Temple, Simtola, Brightend Corner and Kamlimath Museum. Dinner and overnight stay will be at the hotel.

sightseeing.desc: Uttarakhand, a state in northern India crossed by the Himalayas, is known for its Hindu pilgrimage sites. Rishikesh, a major centre for yoga study, was made famous by the Beatles’ 1968 visit. The city hosts the evening Ganga Aarti, a spiritual gathering on the sacred Ganges River. The state's forested Jim Corbett National Park shelters Bengal tigers and other native wildlife.

review.title: Superb
review.name: Ravi
review.desc: I am grateful to Myoho Holidays for planning a great holiday trip for my parents.
